means: 有礼貌地，客气地，委婉地

sentence.Network_en: He offered the boys some coffee. They declined politely.
sentence.Network_cn: 他问那些小伙子要不要来点咖啡，他们婉辞了。

sentence.Network_en: She smiled, politely rather than with tenderness or gratitude.
sentence.Network_cn: 她只是出于礼貌地笑了笑，而非出于关心或感激。

sentence.Network_en: The audience are strangely subdued, clapping politely after each song.
sentence.Network_cn: 观众们出奇地安静，只是在每首歌结束后报以礼貌性的掌声。

entry.tran: 有礼貌的；客气的；文雅的
entry.def: Someone who is polite has good manners and behaves in a way that is socially correct and not rude to other people.

example.ex: Everyone around him was trying to be polite, but you could tell they were all bored...
example.tran: 他周围的每一个人都极力表现出彬彬有礼的样子，但能够看出他们都感到厌烦。

example.ex: It's not polite to point or talk about strangers in public...
example.tran: 在公共场合对陌生人指指点点或议论纷纷都不礼貌。

entry.def: You can refer to people who consider themselves to be socially superior and to set standards of behaviour for everyone else as polite society or polite company .

example.ex: Certain words are vulgar and not acceptable in polite society.
example.tran: 有些字眼较粗俗，不为上流社会所接受。

sentences.sentence: "the policeman answered politely, `Now look here, lady...'"

auth_sentence.content: You just have to be prepared to sit politely.
auth_sentence.res_content: You just have to be prepared to sit politely.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You just have to be prepared to sit politely.

auth_sentence.content: Kevin Ryan smiles as you politely question his sanity.
auth_sentence.res_content: Kevin Ryan smiles as you politely question his sanity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Kevin Ryan smiles as you politely question his sanity.

auth_sentence.content: The two women politely complimented me on our remodeling.
auth_sentence.res_content: The two women politely complimented me on our remodeling.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The two women politely complimented me on our remodeling.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,表示"……的",通常在在名词后.; 2. 表副词,放在形容词后,"……地"

stems_affixes.word_buile: come来+ly……的→翩翩而来→美丽动人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cost代价+ly……的→adj.昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
drizz毛毛雨+ly……的→adj.毛毛雨的[a drizzly day]
friend朋友+ly……的→adj.友好的,友谊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很可能的,合适的,可靠的
stems_affixes.word_buile: like像+ly……的→adj.很可能的,合适的,可靠的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: live活+ly……的→adj.活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
man男人+ly……的→adj.男子气概的,果断的
niggard小气鬼+ly……的→adj.吝啬的,勉强的
otherworld超世+ly……的→adj.超脱尘世的,超俗的
spindle细长的人[或物]+ly……的→spindly细长的,纤弱的
time时间+ly……的→adj.及时的,适时的
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
continuous连续的+ly……的→adv.不断地,连续地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 幸福地,愉快地,恰当地,幸亏
stems_affixes.word_buile: happy快乐的,幸福的+ly……的→happily幸福地
active积极的+ly……地→adv.活跃地,积极地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
according相符的+ly……地→adv.因此,从而
final最后的+ly……地→adv.最后,终于

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
stems_affixes.word_buile: actual[adj.实际的, 真实的, 现行的, 目前的]+ly……地→adv.实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
adequate足够的+ly……地→adv.充分地
consequent作为结果的+ly……地→adv.从而,因此
anxious担忧的+ly……地→adv.忧虑地,不安地
biological[adj.生物学的]+ly……地→adv.生物学上
certain肯定的+ly……地→adv.的确,[口语]当然,行
chief主要的+ly……地→adv.首要,主要地
commercial商业的+ly……地→adv.商业上,通商上

stems_affixes.value_cn: 普遍地,通常地,现在,当前

excessive过分的+ly……地→adv.过分地,非常地
extreme极端的+ly……地→adv.极端地,极其,非常
aggressive侵略的+ly……地→adv. 侵略地,攻势地

progressive前进的+ly……地→adv.日益增多地
prompt敏捷的+ly……地→adv.敏捷地,迅速地
relative相对的;相关的+ly……地→adv.相关地
repeated重复的+ly表副词→adv.重复地,再三地

month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊

Sentence.sentence: Ask to see the manager politely but firmly.
Oh, I will," he answered politely.

means.word_mean: 有礼貌地;客气地;委婉地

sentences.en: He cannot refuse if you ask politely.
sentences.cn: 如果你客气一点的话,他是不会拒绝的。

sentences.en: He has a politely diffident manner.
sentences.cn: 他的态度是客气中带有羞怯。

sentences.en: He politely pretended not to have heard this remark.
sentences.cn: 他有礼貌地假装没有听到这句话。
